it.polimi.se2.meteocal.entity

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2.meteocal.entity.Notification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Entity
public class Notification
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Entity class for a generic notification

    • Constructor Detail

      • Notification

        public Notification()
        Constructor that simply initiates the date as the current one.

      • Notification

        public Notification(String title,
                    String content,
                    boolean invitation)
        Constructor taking as parameters the basic data about the notification. The date is initialized as the current one.
        Parameters:
        title: - the notification title
        content: - the notification title
        invitation: - true if the invitation is an invitation
